name: the angels have gone
description:
The zip file "hydrostat.zip" and the html file for this project should be opened and progressed on their path in tandem. the other zip file's purpose will become apparent upon progression. I would recommend you use a writing implement, a notes app, or a notepad/word file if you have trouble remembering series of words while reading other more entangled series of words.

The unity builds within this project make use of a VR headset, specifically any headset from the Oculus line, however a VR headset is not required to see all of this project.

The files labeled README are part of the project. Please take the time to actually read them, I promise they're not that long.

Also, the astute observer will notice that there's a way to cheat. I can't really do much about this, so I will just politely ask that if you find out how you... not do that? It doesn't really matter, but I feel that it cheapens the experience.

-made as the final project for GAM 420 - Creative Computation. Thanks for a great quarter everyone! DM me if you find any major bugs or are having trouble opening, downloading, or running the project.
